summary: Your own Castle and Village! Work In Progress. All castle walls buildings and towers will have interiors as well as all the village buildings. There will be a Tavern, Hotel, Brothel, Alchemy Shop, Weapons Shop, Black Smith, Fletcher, Tanner, and much more! Check out the USABLE CATAPULTS. Please let me know if you have any questions or reque
descriptionHtml:
Watch the building of this mod on Twitch! www.twitch.tv/shepherdofmen
This will be a complete player home. A Quest line will be added to gain access. I am hesitant to keep this mod up for download because I don't want people to become uninterested with it based upon the lack of usability at this moment. Jug and I both are working none stop on getting as much content accessible for everyone interested. I just wanted people to see the progress we make daily with being able to watch the making of on Twitch www.twitch.tv/shepherdofmen. Please let us know your thoughts. We will do everything we possibly can to make this mod compatible with as many mods as we can.

Soon to come:
Inside the Keep:
Throne Room
Noble Living Quarters
Bathroom
Follower Living Quarters
Servant Living Quarters
Kitchen
Great Hall

Inside Village:
Tavern
Inn
Brothel
Black Smith
Fletcher
Tanner
Alchemy Shop
Weapon Shop
and more.

Watch the Building of on Twitch! http://www.twitch.tv/shepherdofmen
author: ShepherdofMen and Juggernaut
